title: Sorting Built-in Types in Go (Challenge)
description: The Go programming language provides a built-in package named sort that implements sorting for builtins and user-defined types. In this challenge, we will focus on sorting for builtins.

meta.title: Sorting Built-in Types in Go
meta.description: Learn how to sort strings and integers using the built-in sort package in Go programming language.
meta.keywords: go playground, go programming, integers, go, go labs, go playground online, sort package, strings, sorting, go lab
